item.description:
Let's meetup to see "Clash of the Titans" in 3D. The 3D show is more expensive, but more fun too. The movie starts at 6:30 PM. Let's meet in the lobby at Showcase in Worcester at about 6:00. I'll wear my Superman cap so you can recognize me. If you need to reach me, call my cell phone at 508-981-0455.

I originally scheduled this meetup for Solomon Pond Mall, but they don't have a 3D show on Friday. So I changed the venue to Showcase in Worcester. I apologize if this is inconvenient for anyone who already RSVPed "Yes".

If you have the time, please join me for food, drinks, and socializing after the movie.

- David

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: Clash of the Titans in 3D
